inn1.comm: Some swing to start off. Homing in on the off stump line, slightly wobble away, Omar, as his wont, lunges forward and defends to off side.
short of length, on the middle and leg stump line, kicks up a touch, defended on the front foot
fuller, on the middle, Omar pushes it back to Zaheer.
Nagging line continues. On the off stump line, on a length, Omar leans forward, pushes it to the off side.
beaten. In the zone outside off, swinging away with the angle, Omar stabs at it, the ball teases the outside edge and heads towards Dhoni
Maiden over. On the middle this time, Omar eases forward, dabs it down the track. A very bottom-handed player.
Swings in. Fullish, on the middle and leg, veers towards leg and raps Tamim on the pad as he is beaten trying to flick it away. Two slips in place
again slips down the leg side, must have clipped the pad as the Umpire doesn't call it a wide.
Corrects his line, hurls one outside off stump and it went straight with the arm. Tamim couldn't resist the urge to have a swipe and is beaten

big appeal for a catch down leg side. Full-pitched down the legside, moving away, and it clipped something on the way to a diving Dhoni. Indians think its wood, umpire is convinced it was off the pad.
Mixed bag this from Sreesanth. Way outside off stump. The wrist position went awry at the release. He wanted to push it across Tamim.

beaten. Much closer to the off stump and it seams away and again Tamim has a lame poke. He must be confused with all this wayward bowling. At times down leg side, at times it is way outside off and suddenly one teases the outside edge.
In the corridor outside off, left alone
pushes it across Omar who lets it go through to Dhoni
on the off stump line, on a length, Omar comes forward, nudges it to point region. Meanwhile Tamim is practising a flamboyant cut shot at the other end.
Crack. Javed Omar is up and away. Slightly short but there was some width offered outside off and Omar cut it past point. It was the shot that Tamim was practising.
beaten. Much better from Zaheer. It was fuller, just short of driveable length, just outside off stump and Omar was sucked into a forward prod. The ball left him  late.

And again. This one was much better. It landed around leg stump on a length and went right across Omar who had a waft but is completely surprised by the amount of movement. The rain and the foxes must have spiced up the track.
Three times in a row. Again slanting away from Omar, slanting away from the outside edge.
Classy. Leant forward to a full-length delivery on the off stump line and just drove through the line, straight down the track. Eye-catching stroke.

Lara-like squaredrive but Yuvraj Singh at point comes in the way. Else it would have been another boundary. It was fullish and outside off and Tamim was quick to get on the front foot and drive. Yuvraj dived to his right to make the stop.
Over Yuvraj this time. Try stopping that!  Again full and outside off, may be they are setting a trap, but boy! what a response. Tamim leant forward and square-drove it up and over Yuvraj.

edged, along the ground, to second slip where Sehwag makes a half-stop. It was  on a length, slanting away from Tamim who didn't get his feet back and across and just stood there and tried to punch on the up
legcutter on the middle and off, Omar dabs it away to the off side
Full-pitched outside off stump, driven to cover
Hello! this one flies over Dhoni. Banged in short, and it took off and just kept climbing. Tamim ducked, Dhoni jumped but the ball just flew over
Elegant off drive. Fullish, on the off stump line, Tamim eases forward, drives between Zaheer and Powar at a widish mid-off
on the middle and off, on a length, Tamim leans forward, drives, bottom-hand takes over, the bat-face shuts and the ball heads between the bowler and mid-on
full-pitched outside off stump and Omar dabs it down to third man
Whooshed away. Overpitched outside off stump and Tamim is quick to get on to the front foot and creams it past short cover. All along the ground. Tamim has jumped to 18.
lands on a length, outside off stump, moves away a touch. Omar leans forward, sees the movement, withdraws his bat from the line and lets it fly past him.
pitches on a length again, closer to the off stump this time, and goes on striaght, and it keeps slightly low and Omar crouches forward to defend
on the off stump line, on a length, driven with that bottom-hand grip of his to cover
hits the deck back of length, on the middle stump line, kicks up a touch, Omar thinks it would bounce more than it does and hops up and the ball thuds into the thigh pad

fuller in length, on the middle and off stump line, shapes in, Omar moves forward calmly and defends with the full face of the bat. Sreesanth makes the stop and quickly turns behind as if he going to have a shy at the non-striker's end. Tamim is sitting pretty inside the crease.
on the off stump line, goes on straight, Tamim nudges it to the off side
In the zone outside off, Tamim lets it go through to the 'keeper

Edged between Dhoni and the first slip. Agony for Zaheer, joy for Tamim. Fullish, outside off stump,Tamim has a flash and gets a outside edge. It flies rapidly between Dhoni and Sehwag, who is standing slightly wide and both stare at each other. Not-a-man move.
attempted yorker, on the middle stump line, jabbed away cautiously
in the corridor outside off, left alone by Tamim
on a length, on the off stump line, punched to short mid off
landed on a length, angling in to off and middle, pushed to short mid off
lands outside off stump, on a length, cuts in a touch, Omar stabs at it, gets a inside-edge and it runs down to fine leg
full and on the middle and leg, flicked to the on side.
full in length, on the leg stump line, goes on straight, Tamim tries to flick, gets a inside-edge on to the pad and it runs to fine leg region
delivered from wide of the crease, on the middle stump line, Omar pushes it down the track.
nice wrist position at the release. It hits the deck short of length, just outside off stump and shapes away, Omar watches the line and the movement and shoulders arms

bangs it short of length, on the middle, Omar pushes it back to Sreesanth who again threatens to throw it back at the stumps. Doesn't. Omar looks at him calmly while the crowd roar their displeasure. Drama.
again full in length, on the middle and leg, flicked through midwicket
full and well outside off, Tamim has a slash, mis-times a drive to cover. Omar thinks there is a run, Tamim doesnt' agree and Omar has to rush back to his crease
here comes the Tamim charge. Dances down the track, has a heave at a short of length delivery, looking to hit it over mid off, doesnt' time it well and it rolls between bowler and mid off.
Yorker on the off stump line, Tamim gets his bat down in a hurry, digs it out to the off side and Zaheer rushes towards the ball
Slower one but that travelled faster off Tamim's bat. Fullish, outside off and Tamim goes over extra cover.
comes down the track, moving away to the leg side a touch, Zaheer hurls in a yorker and Tamim jabs it away to the on side.
Slog fest. Again he skips down the track and tries to heave a length delivery over midwicket. Doesn't connect well and the ball rolls to the leg side
full and on the stumps, pushed down to cover, no chance of a single
very straight and on the stumps, Javed Omar defends carefully to the leg side, he's being very watchful even as Tamim Iqbal takes the attack to the Indian bowlers
short of a good length and slipping down the leg side, Sreesanth really not on target today, played at and missed, off the thighpad to the keeper, stifled shout for the catch behind
short of a driving length and on the off stump, Javed Omar pokes at it, the ball goes off a thickish inside edge down to the leg side
short and a bit of width, Javed Omar waits on the ball and cuts late, and well, the ball goes all along the ground to Ramesh Powar on the point boundary
full-toss down the leg side, Tamim Iqbal jams the bat down on the ball and gets it away to fine-leg for a single that will let him keep the strike
very full and outside the off, Iqbal goes for the booming drive but does not connect properly, off the inside edge to the leg side
good-length ball on the off, Iqbal gets to the line of the ball nicely, stands tall and drives on the up, keeping the ball down and just wide of cover for a single
very full and very straight, Omar gets behind the line of the ball nicely and punches back down the ground, it's dead straight and crashes into the stumps at the non-striker's end
short of a good length and outside the off, Omar watches the ball carefully and leaves it alone to the keeper
full and outside the off, Omar drives again, this time he finds the man at mid-off and there's no chance of a run
good-length ball on the off, slanting in with the arm, Omar waits on the ball and defends with soft hands back down the pitch
flat and fairly quick through the air to begin with, on the off, Iqbal punches off the back foot
tossed up and outside the off, Iqbal pokes the ball away for a single through cover
well flighted up once more, Omar watches the ball onto bat and drives down to long-on for a single that brings up the 50 of the opening partnership. This is a good start.
flighted and outside the off, Iqbal gets to the line of the ball and eases it down to long-off, Sreesanth fumbles and the batsmen can come back for a second
on the pads and quite full, glance played and missed, rapped on the pads
down the track and crack! That's well hit but won't beat the man at long-on, end of Powar's first over, five runs off it
flash and a miss. That Tamim charge again, down the track and tries to flat -bat a short of length delivery on the off stump line but the ball bounces over the flashing blade
fuller, on the middle stump line, Tamim leans forward to defend
on the middle and leg, on the hips, clipped towards middwicket and Sehwag has a shy at the non-striker's end, misses and they pick a over throw
on the off stump line, on a length, punched to Karthik to cover

risky run attempted. Pushes a length-delivery to Karthik at cover and sets off. Omar, wisely, sends him back and Karthik has a throw at the striker's end but Tamim makes it in time. The throw misses the stumps but Dhoni moves rapidly to back up
nicely fligthed, loops up outside off stump and dips rapidly. Omar is down the track but is beaten by the dip and adjusts to defend
loopy flighted stuff, outside off stump, pushed to cover
slightly short outside off stump and Omar pounces on the length and cuts it past point. Sehwag gives the chase but can't haul it back in.
beaten in the flight. Looped up, on the stumps, Omar goes for a drive but doesn't reach the pitch and it goes uppishly down to long on
leans forward and paddle-sweeps it to fine leg for a single
lands on the off stump line, turns away, Tamim waits for the spin before cutting to deep point
edged down to third man. Full and outside off, slanting away, Tamim drives and gets a outside edge, no slip in place and will get a single
wide down the leg side, Omar tries to reach it but can't.
lands on a length, outside off stump, shapes in a touch, Omar leans forward, pushes it to the off side. Defence from one end, Omar and offense from Tamim. That's the way Bangladeshis are approaching.
leans forward, pushes a length-delivery past the bowler and will pick up a single before mid on can move to his left to make the stop
length-delivery, slanting away from Tamim who waits, opens the bat-face and guides it to third man
126.1 kmph, full and outside off, square-driven to sweeper cover. Munaf is ambling in there and is bowling at a gentle pace. No great effort to put the shoulder in at the release as well.
goes around the stumps. Homes in on the off stump line, pushed to cover point

slow, loopy, flighted and almost had Omar. It goes above the eye-level, outside off stump, dips quickly, lands, grips and turns sharply. Omar had come down the track to have a heave but is beaten by the dip and gets a inside edge on to the pad
leans forward to defend to a flighted delivery outside off
Hello! Omar connects this time. Again down the track and is quick on his feet this time and lofts a flighted delivery over long on. Purely powered by bottom hand.
leans forward to defend. Caution after offense.
And again. Powar really flighted this up, daring Omar to have a go but he resists.
tossed up, outside off stump, driven to long on
from round the stumps, fullish, on the middle and leg, Omar has a vertical sweep, down to fine leg boundary.
flighted up, lands on the off stump line, Omar is bit late in getting forward, and gets a outside edge as the ball spins away. No slip though.
comes down the track and defends as he doesn't get to the pitch

Mongia picks up the first wicket. Tossed-up, on the off stump line, Tamim dances down the track, doesn't quite reach the pitch and goes through with his lofted shot. The ball spins in and makes contact with the inside-half of the bat and sails straight to long on
slow through the air, on the middle stump line, flighted delivery, defended on the front foot
spins in from outside off and Bashar leans forward to defend

Powar gets rid of Bashar. Done in by the flight and the dip. He tossed it up beautifully, above the eye-level, outside off stump, Bashar comes down the track but the ball dips rapidly, turns and beats the intended lofted shot. Makes contact with the inside half of the bat, much like how Tamim fell, and gently loops up to mid on. Bashar's miserable run with the bat continues.
flatter, pushes that one through quicker, on the middle stump line, dabbed away to the on side
on the middle and leg, flicked to square-leg
leans forward to a tossed-up delivery outside off, and drives through cover
on the off stump line, driven back to the bowler
on the off stump line again, Saqibul waits and punches it through mid off region
arm-ball on the off stump line, leans forward to push it to off side
slightly short, outside off, cuts but straight to point
quicker off the turf. It landed on the off and middle and went on with the arm, arm-ball, Omar crouches forward, gets his bat down in a hurry to keep it out
around the off stump, nudged to the off side
oh ho, a lap shot. Just walked across the stumps, and paddle-scoops a delivery on the off stump to fine leg region
on the off stump line, pushed to extra cover
on the leg stump line, turns in, Saqibul was itching to get forward but Powar had not flighted this one and waits to push it to wide mid off
Flighted up, outside off stump, Omar comes down the track, crouches and uses his bottom-hand to slog sweep it to long on boundary
on the middle stump line, defended to the on side.
leans forward, drives towards mid on for a quick single
on the middle stump line, driven to cover
leans forward, gets to the pitch of the delivery and drives to long off
dangerous. It was a fullish delivery, on the middle, Saqibul had backed away in a pre-determined fashion and was almost cleaned up but manages to dab it away to point.
leans forward, drives towards mid on for a single
on the off stump line, pushed away to off side for a single
around the off stump, on a length, again gentle seam-up stuff, punched to point
lands on a length, around off stump, dabbed away to third man
length-delivery, around the off stump, angling away, punched to cover point
back of length, on the middle stump line, Saqibul tries to pull but it was not that short and he mistimes it to the on side
125.3 kmph, on the off stump line, forced away to point.
short of length, outside off stump and cut away through backward point. Very nicely placed by Omar.
leans forward to defend to the off side
fuller, outside off stump, Omar waits and cuts it to backward point where Munaf makes the stop
on the middle and leg, nudged to the on side, behind square for a single
Saqibul continues to try and attack. Heaves a length-delivery, uppishly without much power or timing towards wide long on
On the hips, clipped straight to Powar who is at short fine leg.
length-delivery on the middle and off stump line, for some reason Saqibul thinks he can cut that, hops up and tries to cut but is cramped up and ends up chopping it towards point
on the off stump line, on a length, pushed down the track
slower one, on the off stump line, full in length, square-driven to point
126.6 kmph, fullish, outside off, driven straight to cover
another slower one, 108 k, on the middle stump line, fullish, pushed back to the bowler. Maiden over there. Change of pace and a nagging line and length.
full-pitched on the middle stump line, Omar crouches forward, pushes it softly down the track
length-delivery, on the middle and off, punched on the up, down the track and Zaheer moves sharply across to his left to make the stop
lands on a length, on the middle and leg, Omar presses forward and whips it away past square-leg. Lovely use of the wrists there and lots of bottom-hand.
similar line and length, doesn't wrist it away this time, just dabs it to square-leg
fullish, outside leg stump, goes on straight, Omar runs it down to fine leg
And he goes over that short fine leg fielder. Cheeky lap shot. He just moved across the stumps, scoop-paddled a length-delivery on the middle stump line over shrot fine leg. Hmm....
leans forward, drives to extra cover for a single

streaky edge through vacant slip region. He skipped down the track, has a flash at a length-delivery slanting away, gets a outside edge and picks up a four. Munaf is not amused. Omar is as he congratulates Saqibul.
lands on a length, around off stump, driven to sweeper cover
127.7k full and well outside off stump, carved away to deep point
Saqib charges down the track, Munaf, cleverly, drags back the length, keeps it on the middle and pushed back to him
slower one this time, 106.1 k, on the middle and leg, Saqibul leans forward, waits for the ball to arrive, places it to wards mid on
leans forward, is beaten in the flight, drives towards long off
sharp turn there. Landed well outside off stump, Omar leant forward and was surprised as the ball spun back in and he dabbed it to on side
flighted delivery, lands on leg stump line, turns across Saqibul who tries to force it away off the back foot, gets a inside-edge on to the pad
dabs to the on side for a single
spins in from outside off, flicked to square-leg for a single
outside off stump, slightly short of length, cut to point
floated up on the middle stump line, lofted to widish long on where Karthik sprints across and puts a sliding dive to make the stop.
sharp turn from outside off stump, Omar shapes to cut but the ball spins more than he expected but still manages to get it down to short third man region
fullish, on the leg and middle, flicked past square-leg
spins sharply from outside off stump, Omar shuffles across, allows the ball to spin past his hips, tickles it to short fine leg. Rafique da would be very interested in the amount of spin on offer.
Nicely played. Tossed-up, outside off and Omar went down on his knee and slog-swept it to deep midwicket boundary. Very well placed.
outside off stump, cuts to third man to bring up his fifty. 10th ODI fifty. Anchoring the innings.
leans forward to defend
spins down the leg side, turned to short fine leg
spins in from outside off stump, defended on the off side.
on the leg stump line, turns, Saqibul goes back, flicks it to midwicket region for a single
fuller, straighter, on the off and middle, defended on the back foot
on the middle and leg, fullish, Omar leans forward, whips it, that bottom hand again, past square leg
tossed-up, on the leg and middle, turns and Saqibul drives down the ground to long off
lands short of length, around off stump, turns in a touch, nudged towards midwicket for a quick single.
on the off stump line, turns away, Saqibul Hasan is beaten by the turn as he shapes to drive and edges it to Piyush Chawla, the substitute for the injured Sreesanth, at short third man
on the leg stump line, spins towards off, cut to backward point
flatter, pushes that one through quicker, on the off stump line, Omar was trying to come down the track, adjusts to defend

similar delivery, Omar guides it towards backward point and rushes for a quick single. Karthik swoops on the ball, tries to throw at non-striker's end but hello! the ball slips out of his hand and goes behind him.
leans forward to drive to cover
beaten. Lands on the leg stump line, full in length and spins away. Saqibul backs away  and tries to cut, not the line or length and is beaten
on the leg and middle, punched down to long on
beaten. Jaffa. Landed outside leg stump, full in length and spun away sharply, Saqibul is beaten by the turn, has a lame poke but the ball spins away past the outside edge
on the leg stump line, tries to drive, it bounds off the pad to Dhoni
comes down the track and drives to long off
yorker length, on the middle and leg stump line, jabbed away.

Fullish, on the off stump line, full in length, Omar tries to whip it away, yorks himself in the process, gets a bottom-edge and it takes it past leg stump and past Dhoni. nicely bowled, beats the batsman but gives a four in the bargain. Such is life, such is this game.
on the leg stump line, flicked away behind square
stays back, waits for the spin before placing it behind square-leg. Very well played. Intelligent cricket.

mis-field by Karthik at long leg. On the leg stump line and swept away, Karthik moves across to his right and mis-fields it, and it bounds away towards the rope but Gautham Gambhir rushes after it and hauls it back in. Karthik picks the ball and hurls in a throw. As a unrelated aside, Karthik just got married recently. No connection to his mis-field!
on the middle and leg, glanced to short fine leg
will retain the strike with adrive to long off
spins down the leg side
And again. Down the leg side.
on the off stump line, Omar backs away, opens the bat-face, late-cuts through short third man region
on the off stump line, driven to long off
on the middle and leg line, swept to short fine leg
lands outside leg, spin in, flicked past square leg
pitches outside off stump and spins into Saqibul who defends it to midwicket
Saqibul tries to cut but misjudges the length and gets beaten outside off stump
driven to long on for a single
tossed up on on off stump, Omar goes down on one knee and sweeps to deep square leg
pushed off the back foot to long on
tries to drive on the off side but the outside edge falls in the vicinity of point
short and wide outside off stump, Saqibul goes on the back foot and cuts to deep point, the batsmen scamper through for two
pushed through midwicket for one more
drifting on to middle and leg, defended on the leg side
a touch too short, Saqibul moves back and cuts to the man on the point fence
tossed up on off stump, Omar works it into the gap between long on and deep midwicket
Omar uses his feet, steps down the the track and drives through wide mid off for a single
floated full in length, well outside off stump, cut to backward point
flatter, on the off and middle, punched down the track, Mongia makes a half-stop
landed on a length, outside off stump and kept low - dangerous signs if you are an Indian batsman - pushed out by Saqibul
rotates the strike with a drive to long on
on the off stump line, slow through the air, full in length, and Omar reached out and swept it to the on side
on the off stump line, glides forward and eases it down to long off
full and on the middle, driven down to long on
slightly short in length, around off stump, forced off the back foot to cover
fuller, on the middle stump, driven with the turn to long off
comes down the track, Sehwag keeps it full, on middle and leg and is driven down to long on
lands outside leg stump, turns in, flicked to short fine leg
slog-swept over deep midwicket. Super strike. It was floated up, outside the off stump and Omar crouched forward and with that powerful bottom hand slog swept it high and over.
And again. One bounce over the ropes. Again flighted on the off and middle, Omar took his front leg from the line and smacked him over midwicket.
flatter, fuller, on the middle stump line, driven inside-out to cover
steps down the track, Mongia drags back the length and adjusts to defend

Lazy running, may be tired, from Omar. On the middle stump line, he had attempted a slog sweep, got a edge and it ballooned towards long off. Landed in no man's land in front of Zaheer Khan. Omar turns for second run and ambles down the track. Zaheer fires in a direct hit which catches Omar short of the crease. Omar made a valuable 80.
lands on the off and middle, Asharful shuffles across, waits for the spin, tickles it to short fine-leg for a single

spins from outside off, Ash nudges it to the off side and sets off for a non-existent run. Dhoni rushes towards it, and fires in a throw at the striker's end as Ashraful retreats, misses and they get a overthrow
comes down the track and lofts inside-out to widish long off
drives straight to long off this time.
lands outside off, spins in, Ash backs to cut to Sreesanth at backward point who fires in a awkward throw at Sehwag who fumbles and another overthrow. Hmm..
picks up a single with his favourite drive down to long off
turns in from off, Ashraful waits, lets the ball spin past him, glances it to fine leg
on the middle and leg, pushed down to long on. Huge roar goes up as Saqibul reaches his fifth ODI fifty. Well played boss.
leans forward, nudges a delivery on middle to the on side
on the middle again, swept to Sehwag at short fine-leg fielder

floated up, on the stumps and Ash drives inside-out over extra cover. Karthik rushes across, throws in a dive but can't prevent. He landed awkwardly on his knee near the ropes. That was a bad way to dive.
works to midwicket region for a single

beaten in the flight and stumped. Flighted delivery on the off stump and Saqibul jumped down the track,  had a swing and got a inside-edge and it rolled past the stumps to Dhoni who whipped the bails off. It was referred upstairs and the verdict is .... OUT
length-delivery on the off stump line, pushed to extra cover region
Lovely inside-out cover drive. Full-pitched, on the off stump line and Ash creamed it over extra cover. Great to watch. Pocket-full of talent. This is his 100th ODI.
wide outside the off stump. That's one way of preventing Ash from hitting him.
yorker, dug out to the off side and they steal a run

fullish, on middle and leg, Aftab leans forward, takes out his front leg quickly from the line and whips it past Karthik at mid on. Karthik gives the chase and hurls in a  dive. Nice intent and all that but the ball had crossed the ropes even when he was in the air.
yorker, on the off stump line, jabbed away to backward point
slow through the air, on the off stump line, Ashraful tries to sweep, bottom-edges it to pad
outside off stump, slightly short in length, cut to point
drifts in on the middle and leg, tickled behind square for a single
comes down the track, Mongia sends it on the leg stump line, driven to deep midwicket
quicker, slips down leg side, flicked to long leg
on the middle stump line, backs away to leg side and scoops it inside-out towards sweeper cover
low full-toss on the middle stump, Ashraful backs away, drives to long off
beamer! Umpire has a chat with Zaheer. Aftab had charged down the track and was surprised to recieve a chest-high full toss. A attempted yorker that went awry.
driven to long on for single
fullish, on the off stump line, square-driven inside-out to deep point region
walks down the track, Zak fires in a yorker, Aftab attempts to swing it away to on side, gets a leading edge to cover
on the leg stump line, worked past square leg. Big no ball. 18 extras. 13 wides and five no balls
attempted yorker ends up as a low full toss and Aftab walks down the track and drills it past Munaf Patel at mid on. Four valuable runs. Bangladesh have their feet on the accelerator.
short in length, quicker, punched to sweeper cover
appeal for lbw.  floated on the middle and leg, Ashraful plays a vertical sweep and  it must have hit his gloves before rolling over to short fine leg region
comes down the track and drives to long on
stays back, waits for the turn, pinches a single with a dab towards square leg
on the off stump line, late cut to third man region
Ashraful perishes going for the runs. He skipped down the track  and tried to swing a delivery on the middle stump  line over to the on side, ball beat the bat and met the sticks.
down the track and Sehwag adjusts by going for the blockhole, pushed towards midwicket and they rush across for a quick single
rotates the strike with a nudge towards point
Aftab has one almighty swing but is beaten in the flight, gets a inside-edge on to the pad.
full and outside off stump, carved away to long off
misses a sweep and is caught in front. It was flatter, on the middle stump line and turned slightly. Aftab went for a slog sweep, missed it completely and was struck in front of middle.
on the off stump line, cut to cover point
full and on the off and middle, driven to long on
floated outside leg stump, Rafique is down the track, backing away to leg side in the process, has a swing but gets a inside edge past midwicket
flatter and faster, on the off and middle, attempts to cut but gets a bottom edge down the track
Wow! Inside-out drive over deep cover. He came down the track, made room for himself by moving outside leg stump and sliced it over cover.
Rafique falls off the last ball of the innings. He ran down the track and swung a low full toss down the throat of long off. Bangladesh end up with a very healthy 250.

inn2.comm: lands on the off stump line, shapes away a touch, dabbed to point
beaten Rasel gets his outswing going. Around the off stump and Gambhir was feeling for it, away from the body and ends up pushing inside the line

back of length, on the off stump line, pushed to cover point where Aftab swoops in and hurls a throw diving himself forward but misses. Had it hit, it would have got very interesting. Sehwag might have found himself short.
length-delivery on the off stump, driven on the up down the track.
And he has a go at it. Full-pitched, well outside off stump and Sehwag carves it over cover. He is going to go for the jugular.
Two in a row. length-delivery, just outside off stump and kept a touch low, Sehwag stayed beside the line and sliced it through backward point
from round the stumps, 132.4 k delivery, slipping down the leg side, clipped away to fine leg. Three fours in a row for the Indians.
16 runs in four balls. And again slipping down the leg side, fuller this time and Gambhir helps himself with a tickle to fine leg.
Shahadat still stays around the stumps. Full in length, again dangerously on the pads, flicked away to fine leg. There was a hint of inswing there.
In the zone outside off stump, from over the wickets, Sehwag plants the front foot across, covers the off stump and shoulders arms
swings way outside off stump, Sehwag resists the urge to free his arm and lets it fly past him.
shuffles slightly, gets in line and drives a full-pitched delivery to the off side. It makes contact with the bottom-half of the bat
132 k, short of length, lands outside off stump, shapes away a touch, Sehwag plays away from his body and pushes it out to cover point
comes down the track, Rasel keeps it full and in the corridor outside off stump, swings it away, and Gambhir lets it go past him. Hmm..
Fours keep coming. Shortish, on the off stump and it sat up for Gambhir to pull it away. He obliges and picks up a boundary.
tip and run. Pushes a length-delivery towards mid on for a quick single. Sehwag on strike. Rasel will try to swing it back into him.
length-delivery, slanting away from Sehwag who plays it on the up towards mid off
inside-edge, almost dragged on to the stumps. It landed on a length, on the off stump and Sehwag tried to swing it across the line and got a inside edge
length-delivery on the off stump line, again Sehwag tries to drive on the up, bat-face shuts and the ball rolls back to the bowler
on the hips, clipped straight to square leg
lands on a length, around middle and off, moves towards off, Gambhir leans forward, is slightly late in doing so and jabs it on to the pad
Fullish, on the middle and leg, swings in, Gambhir had placed his front leg a trifle too across, adjusted quickly to the inswing by taking it out of the line and flicks through midwicket
hits the deck short of length, on the middle and leg, Gambhir hops up, gets on top of the bounce, glances it to fine leg
homing in on the off stump line, holds its line, Sehwag is squared-up slightly, pushes it out to the off side.

Nice. On the middle stump line, on a length, shaping in, Sehwag whipped it away past square leg. Ashraful gave the chase from square leg, Tamim came across from long leg and both dived simultaneously near the ropes, collided with each other and the ball rolled over.
on the middle and leg, pushed to mid on, Sehwag went for a run, Gambhir sent him back and Sehwag makes it back in time
Teasing line outside off stump, moves away, Gambhir watches it all the way into Rahim's gloves. Rahim, chirpy as ever, shouts out words of encouragement to the bowler
tip and run. Gambhir leant forward, played with soft hands, placed it towards mid on and they complete the single
edged in the air towards third man. A length-delivery slanting away from Sehwag who freed his arms at the width offered, got a thick outside edge and it ballooned towards third man

Got him! Plumb. It landed on a length, on the off stump line, came in and Gambhir placed his front leg across, a touch too across, and had to play around the pad. No wood on leather and he was caught dead in front. Bangladesh strike. Who will come out to bat now?
well outside the off stump, slanting away, Dhoni lets it go through to Rahim who is standing up.
nice probing delivery, around the off stump and it came in off the seam. Sehwag poked at it, unsure of its destination and unsure about his off stump and got a inside edge on to the pad
on the middle stump line, whipped past square-leg
Another inside edge. Lands on a length, outside off stump, comes in, Sehwag tries to hit it on the up through cover, bat comes outside the line and gets a inside edge to fine leg
outside off stump, punched to point
full-pitched on the middle and leg, Dhoni made sure his front leg was not too much across, maintained his balance and whipped it to right of mid on for a boundary.
short of length, kicks up a touch outside off stump, Dhoni hops up, tries to force it through cover but can't get power behind it and it rolls over to the off side
crash. Full-pitched, around off stump, slanting away, Sehwag placed his left leg forward and drove it on the up, through the line, inside out, to left of mid off. Head still. Absolutely still.
slower one, full and on the off and middle, driven to mid off
short of length and outside off stump, Sehwag plonked his left foot forward and carved it up and over cover point. There is a deep point but he can't get around in time.
Sehwag is having a ball. Goes down town. Full-pitched delivery around off stump and he knifed through the line, over mid on.
Goes inside out over mid off. The charge is truly on. Full length on the middle and off stump line and Sehwag took his left leg outside the line and creamed it over mid off.

Saqibul takes a beauty at cover. Rasel deceived Sehwag with a slower one. Fullish, on the middle and off and Sehwag again wanted to go inside out over cover, is beaten by the lack of pace and still went through with the shot. It went in the air and appeared as if it would fall short of cover but Saqibul threw himself forward and plucked the ball inches off the turf.
full in length, homing in on the off stump, pushed to cover. Crowd roar. They sense that Bangladesh can tighten the screws now that Sehwag has fallen.

Dhoni goes inside out but superb bit of fielding from Bashar at mid off allows him just a single. Fullish, on the off stump, driven to left of mid off where Bashar moves smartly to his left and dives to make the stop
length-delivery, on the off stump line, Yuvraj dabs it away to the off side
fuller, outside off stump, Yuvraj is late in leaning forward, ends up pushing, bat away from the body, to point
on a length, around off stump, Yuvraj stands up tall and punches on the up down the track.

beaten Landed on a length, outside off stump and held its line. Yuvraj poked at it, inside the line anticipating that the ball would come in with the angle - Shahadat is bowling round the stumps- and is beaten
edged through vacant slip region. Rahim is standing up to the stumps as well. It landed on a length and angled away from Dhoni who had a waft and got a outside edge
length-delivery, around off stump, Dhoni punches it to left of mid off for a single
fullish, on the off stump line, Yuvraj leans forward and defends. "Great ball", yells out Rahim
on the middle stump line, full in length, Yuvraj just pushes at it defensively but he had timed it so well that the ball fairly raced to mid on
leans forward again and dead-bats a length-delivery to the on side
full in length, on the middle stump line, Yuvraj was slightly early into his drive as the ball held up a touch, used his wrists to keep the ball down and placed it to midwicket

Caught at short cover. It was full in length, outside off stump, stops on Yuvraj a touch and he is into his drive early. He tries to adjust by taking the bottom-hand off the handle but still can't keep the ball down. They had it perfectly planned. Slow track, the ball will hold up a touch, give him full-pitched stuff, make him drive, have a short cover and just wait for the mistake.
length-delivery, homing in on the off stump, Dravid gets behind the line and defends down the track
another length-delivery, slightly outside off stump, punched to cover
Bouncer, perfume ball but Dravid is no mood to smell the leather, sways away and it climbs over the head. Wide called.
slipping on to the legs, flicked away straight to square leg where Ashraful fumbles.
on the middle and leg line, flicked away to right of mid on
beaten. Length-delivery, outside off stump, Dhoni tries to dab it down to third man but misses
length-delivery, slanting away from Dravid who cuts it to point
on the off stump line, on a length, Dravid wrists it away to the on side.
slower one, full in length but Dravid picks it and rolls his wrists over to keep the ball down. Rahim likes that delivery.
length-delivery, around off stump, driven to cover
lands on a length, around off stump, full in length, sliced away to point
Classy. Fullish, on the legs, Dravid leans forward, head over the ball and flicks it through midwicket
good length ball pitches outside off stump and angles into Dhoni who waits on the back foot and defends on the off side
a touch fuller outside off stump, Dhoni presses forward and pushes it to wide mid off for a quick single
dangerous stuff from Dravid, he moved a long way across his stumps to flick a ball that angled into his pads to midwicket, he then set off for a non-existant single and was sent back by Dhoni
once more he moves across his stumps and flicks and incoming ball to mid-on, he'll be in serious trouble if he misses one of those
good length delivery outside the off stump, Dravid transfers weight on to the back foot and punches to the man at cover
outstanding stroke, the ball from Hossain is short and wide, Dravid pounces on the width, rocks back and cuts behind point for four, the ball speeds to the fence
huge appeal for leg before is turned down, Razzak fired a quick one straight on to middle and off, Dhoni pushed forward and was hit low on the pad, can't see why that wasn't out
defended towards cover on the front foot
bowled flat and quick on off stump, Dhoni tries to cut past point but can;t pierce the in field
played to cover on the front foot
on the leg and middle, whipped straight to midwicket
on the middle stump line, Dravid stays adjacent to the line, careful not to get his pad in line, drives inside out to mid off
again stays beside the line, drives to the off side. Taking a leg stump guard.
leans forward to defend. Rahim is chirpy as usual.
slightly short, on the off stump line, cut to point
on the middle, jabbed away on the front foot.
skips down the track, plays a pick-up shot over square leg
on the middle and off stump line, dabbed to off side
arm-ball, on the off stump, Dravid was playing for the turn but adjusted quickly at the last minute to nudge it to off side
drifts in on the middle stump line, dabbed to off side. "Oh yes, Oh yes boy,' screams out .. who else .. Rahim
on the off stump line, driven to sweeper cover
comes down the track. slows the pace and drags back the length, Dhoni adjusts, waits, punches it towards mid on region
full and on the legs, wristed in the air past square leg
tossed-up, on the middle stump, fullish, driven to extra cover. Rahim screams out something rapidly in Bengali.
on the middle stump line, deflected to midwicket
slightly short, cut through backward point.
flighted on the middle and leg, Dhoni is quickly down the track and whips it with powerful bottom-hand grip over to long on boundary. One bounce over the rope.
arm-ball, on the stumps, dabbed away to cover
short in length and outside off stump, Dravid cuts past the diving Saqibul at point
fullish, landed outside leg stump line, went on with the arm and hit Dhoni on the pad who pushed outside the line. Rahim goes up in appeal, turned down
outside off and cut away to left of deep point where Ashraful moves to his left to make a fine stop
Dhoni charges out, a touch too early and Razzak, cleverly, fires it down leg side, Dhoni quickly gives up any idea of hitting and gets back into the crease
skips down the track, reaches the pitch of a flighted delivery and whips it over mid on
tossed-up, on the legs, driven between midwicket and long on
gets forward, drives straight to mid off
drifting in on to the pads, Dhoni tries to whip it away to on side, misses and is struck on the pad. Outside leg stump.
slightly short, tries to cut but mistimes it to off side
fuller, outside off, Dravid leans forward, drives to long off

arm-ball, lands on the middle stump, goes on with the arm, Dhoni leans forward, stays adjacent to the line and defends. Rafique is looking to trap him lbw and the batsman are making every effort not to get the left leg across
flighted, from round the stumps, outside off stump, driven to cover
from wide of the crease, on the middle and leg, tickled to square leg
again wide of the crease, round-arm action, outside off stump, pushed to cover
looped up outside off stump, spins away, Dravid had backed away and reached out and cut it in the air over point
leans across, turns a fullish delivery on middle, to the on side for a single
comes down the track, Rafique drags back the length, worked to right of midwicket
beaten by the spin. It looped up on the leg stump line, Dravid shaped to flick it away but it gripped, spun , took the outside edge and went through vacant slip region
leans forward, places a fullish delivery to right of midwicket for a single
goes back, punches to long off for yet another single
slower in the air, full and on the off and middle, Dhoni eases forward,drives to long off
takes leg stump guard, stays beside the line of a arm-ball on the middle, and punches through mid off
on the off stump line, slow in the air, pushed to extra cover
lands on the off stump line, and spins away, dabbed to the off side
short in length, outside off, cut to deep point
leans forward, drives through mid on

Gone! Flighted delivery, outside off, Dravid leant forward, little late in doing so, the balance went awry and he went for a square-drive but was not to the pitch and ended up slicing it straight to backward point. Dravid gone for 22 and India slip further. Typical left-arm spinner's wicket on a slow track.
quiker, outside off stump, spins in, Mongia pushes forward in defence, gets hit on the pad
short in length, drifts in on to the middle and leg, worked past square elg
spins in from outside off, Mongia stands tall, eases it to mid off
leans forward, crouches slightly, defends to the on side
slightly short in length, on the off stump, punches it back to the bowler
slow through the air, well outside off stump, bit more flight and Mongia is sucked into a cover drive, and is beaten in the flight. Gets a inside edge to midwicket. Very well bowled.
quicker, fuller, on legs, flicked  to deep midwicket
lands on a length, outside off stump, turns in, wristed to short fine leg
leans forward, drives towards mid on and rushes across for a quick single. Rahim screams out, "Bowler Bowler' and the throw goes there but Mongia had reached
slow through the air, short in length, on the off stump, spins away, Dhoni rocks back, cuts through cover to sweeper position
leans forward, dabs to midwicket
Flighted delivery, well outside off stump, slow in the air and Mongia went back, waited for the ball to spin in and cut it through point. No sweeper in place and he gets a four.
leans forward, defends a fullish ball, back to the bowler

almost ran himself out. came down the track, tried to play to the on side, got a leading edge to the off and he continued running before he saw he was the only batsman there running. Rafique had swooped on the ball and Dhoni rushed back to his crease
on the middle stump, Dhoni backs away to force it to cover
slips down the leg side. Dhoni tries to lap it fine, gets a thin edge past the keeper down leg
leans forward, eases it down to long off
outside off stump, cut to point
tossed-up, on the off stump line, driven to midwicket
driven to long on for a single
from wide of the crease, drifting in on the middle and off, driven to long off, and Dhoni is in pain as he finished that stroke while stretching forward.
driven back to the bowler
comes down the track, is beaten in the flight, goes on with his lofted flick shot and  it falls short of wide long on
strange looking shot. It was outside off stump, Dhoni plonked his left leg right across, crouched, put bat to ball, paddled it across the line towards midwicket.
seam-up, short of length, on the off stump line, punched to mid off
from round the stumps, on the off stump line, flicked to square leg
short, on the off stump, flat-batted down to long on
back to round the stumps for Mongia. Fullish, on the off and middle, driven to long on for a single
wide outside off stump, Dhoni reached for it and tries to cut, gets a bottom edge and it rolls to the off side.
length delivery, outside off stump, biffed to long off
on the off stump line, fullish, driven to left of the bowler who dives to make the stop
comes down the track, defends back to the bowler
slow through the air, short in length, outside off stump and Dhoni jumped on it. Stayed back, made room and forced it powerfully through extra cover
spins in from outside off, short in length, Mongia goes back, punches it but straight to the bowler
comes down the track to a flighted delivery, drives straight back to the bowler who fires in a direct hit at the striker's end but Mongia gets back in time.
short in length again, on the off stump, Dhoni forces it off the back foot to long on
on the off stump line, cut straight to point
Mongia breaks free with a on drive. Full and on the middle and leg, Mongia leans forward, head over the ball and drives between  midwicket and mid on
fullish, outside off stump, driven to sweeper cover
Confusion in running between the wickets. slower one, outside off stump, Dhoni cuts to backward point. Mongia runs, stops, so does Yuvraj who manages to dive into the crease to make it in time.

Mongia is gone! Fifth wicket is down and Bangladesh are truly on top. Flighted delivery sucked Mongia into coming down the track but he couldn't reach the pitch and flicked aerialy low to midwicket. It will all hinge on Dhoni now to steer India to safety and he is fortunate to have an able partner in Karthik
pushed off the front foot to mid off
driven forcefully to cover, good fielding to cut that off
flighted aroud off, Karthik sweeps  and the ball baloons towards short fine leg, streaky but effective enough
this time he comfortably pushes through the line to long-off
bit of width, slashed towards point
tucked away off the pads to the on side
suicidal run! Dhoni cuts to point, declines the single, Karthik was HALFWAY down the pitch, scrambled back and Razzak fumbles with the ball, Karthik was lucky to get away with it
pushed back to the bowler
defended back to the bowler
flighted on leg stump, swept straight to fine leg
Dhoni shows his intent by stepping down the track, pushes to midwicket
driven staright to cover, can;t find the gap
pushed forcefully to the left of the bowler, long off picks it up and thats fifty for Dhoni
pushed back to the bowler, good line by the bowler
Karthik hits hard to cover, misfield allows a single
defended off the front foot back to the bowler
Karthik sweeps, the ball hits the front pad, Razzak appeals in vain
outside off stump, pushed to backward point
slightly short, outside off, cuts but straight to backward point
on the middle and off stump line, turns slightly, worked to midwicket
comes down the track, pushes outside off stump, Karthik lunges across, pushes it past cover
on the middle and leg, sweeps to deep backward square leg
on the middle stump line, driven to long on
lands on a length, on the off stump line, spins away, Karthik goes down on his knee and sweeps it past square leg
full and outside off stump, swept past square leg
comes down the track, moves outside off stump in the process and gets outside the line of a flighted delivery on the off stump and tickles it to short fine leg region
comes down the track, on the off stump line, Dhoni shapes to play to on side, gets a leading edge to cover
slightly short, on the stumps and Dhoni pulls, straight down the ground. Its a slow track.
flighted outside off stump and Karthik quickly goes down on his knee to sweep it away past square leg
slips down leg side, Dhoni tries to play a vertical sweep but can't connect
slightly short, on the off stump line, carved away to long off
outside off stump, spins away, Karthik tries to cut but can't reach
flighted on the middle and again Karthik opts for his favourite sweep
another sweep from Karthik. Another single
slow through the air, outside off stump, Dhoni sweeps it powerfully in front of square and picks up a boundary.
lands on off stump, spins away, Dhoni goes back and swats it to long on
well outside off stump, tossed-up and Karthik goes for a sweep, gets a top-edge over the 'keeper
on the middle and leg, worked past square leg. Very well placed and played with soft hands.
shuffles across, reaches the pitch of a delivery outside off stump and sweeps it past square leg
arm-ball, just outside off stump, Karthik stands tall, waits and punches it to long on
full and on the middle stump line, driven back to the bowler. "Cmon lads, Cmon boys," says Rahim
arm-ball, on the off stump line, Dhoni backs away and wrists it to point
slips down the leg side, Dhoni tries to tickle, misses, and it runs off the pad to fine leg region

Ah! Dhoni charges out, Razzak drags back the length and Dhoni pulls out from the  stroke and tries to get back to his crease and puts his bat into the crease and the ball thuds into the pad and runs through vacant slip region! It has been given as runs but ...
full in length, slanting away from Karthik who waited, opened the bat-face and ran it down to third man
on the leg and middle, on a length, Dhoni wrists it to left of short fine-leg fielder
on the off stump line, from a length, goes with the angle, punched through mid off
fullish, outside off stump, driven to long off
slower one, on the leg stump line, Karthik flicks, uppishly, past square leg
down the leg side, flicked past short fine leg fielder
drifts down leg side, Karthik tries to flick, misses

lands on the off stump, spins away, Karthik drives, away from the body, and gets a outside edge through vacant slip region. 60 to win now. Game is getting interesting but one wicket will swing it towards Bangladesh.
on the off stump line, pushed to extra cover
full and well outside off stump, Karthik shapes to square-drive, gets a outside edge to short third man. There is a slight hesitation but the batsmen decided to go through with the run
on the off stump line, Dhoni jabs it away unconvincingly to the on side
on the off stump line, Karthik shuffles across, gets outside off stump, turns it to square leg for a single
on the middle stump line, comes in with the angle, Karthik eases forward, pushes it back to the bowler. 57 from 53, five wickets in hand
fuller, on the middle and leg, Karthik kept his left leg across and then flicked around the pad, in the air, over square leg
short in length, outside off stump, punched to deep point
length-delivery, on the middle and off, forced off the back foot, down the track
yorker, on the middle stump line, jabbed back to the bowler
almost caught and bowled. Fullish, on the off and middle, Karthik drives, uppishly and goes to left of Rasel who stretches his left hand out but can't reach
Karthik gets a boundary. 48 in 47 balls. Full and outside off stump, Karthik sweeps it to deep midwicket boundary. Bashar would be getting worried.
leans forward, yorks himself, but manages to flick to short fine-leg and Karthik scampers home with a dive.
outside off stump, slightly short of length, whipped past square leg
fuller, on the middle stump line, Dhoni leans forward, drives to long off
appeal for lbw but struck just outside off stump. It landed on the off stump, spun slightly and Karthik was hit on the pads trying to flick it to the on side
fullish, outside off stump, driven inside-out through widish mid-off region
beamer. Slips out of the hand at the release. Dhoni sways away in time. Zaheer also had slipped in one by mistake.

on a length, outside off stump, Dhoni stands tall and punches it past point. They turn for the second and Yuvraj puts in a dive. The bat lands just outside crease and then bobs up in the air as he drags it in. Rahim whips the bail and the bat touches the ground in time as the bails are dislodged. Same frame. Benefit of doubt goes to the batsman.
low full-toss, outside off stump, Dhoni reaches forward, drives singlehandely to widish long off
well outside the off stump, slower in pace, Dhoni lets it go through.
released with a grunt, fullish, outside off stump, Dhoni is hampered by his injury, so doesn't bother to move his left leg across, just reaches out, jabs it away past point
attempted yorker turns into a low full toss, Karthik drives, the bat-face shuts and ball makes contact with the inside-half of the bat and runs to mid on
well outside off stump, flat, quick and Karthik is beaten in trying to go for a cut.
flicked to short fine leg for a single
fullish, on the middle and leg, worked behind square leg for yet another single. 33 to win from 33 balls. Five wickets left.
just outside off stump, full in length, no midwicket in place and Karthik pinches another run with a dab in that region.
on the middle stump line, jabbed away down the track
fullish, on the off stump line, driven to long off
outside off stump, spins away, Dhoni carves it to backward point and they rush across for a quick single
comes down the track, fires it in and Karthik is hit on the pads trying to flick to on side and it rolls to cover point
short in length and Dhoni swats it across the line. Cross-batted swipe.
landed outside off stump, Karthik went for a sweep, misses
slips down the leg side, tried to fire it in and the direction went awry
fullish, outside off stump, Karthik eases forward, drives through extra cover and comes back for two. India inch closer. 25 runs now. 24 balls left.
Slightly short in length , outside off stump and Dhoni stays back and forces it to widish long off. Amazing power from back foot.  He just punched that.
on the middle stump line, driven to cover
again short in length, on the off stump line, goes on with the arm, Karthik backs away, punches it to deep point
fullish, on the middle and off stump line, Dhoni eases it to wards cover point
outside leg stump and Karthik is quick to play his sweep shot. He has used that shot really effectively today.
quickish off spin, outside off stump, Karthik late-uts to short third man. Yuvraj thinks there is a run in it and charges down the track, is sent back and reaches in time.
on the middle stump line, Karthik waits for the ball to turn,  not much spin and dabs it to midwicket region
tossed-up on the middle stump line, pushed to cover
flighted up, outside off stump, Dhoni eases forward, drives uppishly but he places it well, to left of long off
outside off stump, fullish, Dhoni reaches out, swats it away past point
outside off stump, steered to backward point

Easy. Fifty up in style. Very valuable knock. Low full-toss, on the stumps and he knifes through the line. Yuvraj, the bye runner for Dhoni, congratulates him. Then Dhoni hobbles over and hugs Karthik.
leans forward to pat a length-delivery towards mid-off for a easy single. 7 to win. 100 of the partnership up. What a gem it has been. Two busy wicketkeeper-batsmen doing it for India.
another single with a punch to long off
fullish, on the leg side and Karthik leans on to it and swings it to long leg boundary. Stylishly picked up.
slower offcutter, on the off stump line, Karthik leans forward, waits, opens the bat-face, guides to backward point. Just one run left. Dhoni on strike

India have won. By 5 wickets. Fullish, on the middle stump line, Dhoni leans forward and heaves it over midwicket. Camera pans to dressing room. Shastri and Vengsarkar shake hands. The other players are seen clapping.
